Today, the South is quiet with 2 ft @7s SW lines, but the wind is on it at 5 mph NNW. Tomorrow, conditions improve significantly with 3 ft @9s SW and light 9 mph WNW winds, making it a great day to hit the water. The day after, the swell drops back to 2 ft @8s SW with fresh 18 mph W winds, leading to blown-out conditions. Best: tomorrow.
